tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE temperature_control (
  batch_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  temperature DECIMAL,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE TemperatureReadings (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    temperature FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE TemperatureLog ( 
    log_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, 
    temperature DECIMAL, 
    log_time TIMESTAMP, 
    device_name VARCHAR 
)

CREATE TABLE TemperatureThresholds ( 
    threshold_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, 
    min_temperature DECIMAL, 
    max_temperature DECIMAL, 
    drug_name VARCHAR 
)

CREATE TABLE StorageLocation ( 
    location_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, 
    location_name VARCHAR, 
    address VARCHAR, 
    capacity INT 
)

CREATE TABLE SensorDevices ( 
    device_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, 
    device_type VARCHAR, 
    location_id UUID, 
    FOREIGN KEY (location_id) REFERENCES StorageLocation(location_id) 
)

CREATE TABLE TemperatureReading (
	reading_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	sensor_id INT,
	timestamp TIMESTAMP,
	temperature DECIMAL,
	FOREIGN KEY (sensor_id) REFERENCES TemperatureSensor(sensor_id)
);

CREATE TABLE DrugInventory (
	inventory_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	drug_id INT,
	quantity INT,
	expiration_date DATE,
	FOREIGN KEY (drug_id) REFERENCES Drug(drug_id)
);

CREATE TABLE TemperatureAlert (
	alert_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	reading_id INT,	
	alert_message VARCHAR,
	alert_level VARCHAR,
	timestamp TIMESTAMP,
	FOREIGN KEY (reading_id) REFERENCES TemperatureReading(reading_id)
);
